entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
